casebody.data:
Allen H.A. BEGNAUD v. DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION AND DEVELOPMENT, Linda Easley, and Geico. Linda Page EASLEY v. STATE of Louisiana, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION AND DEVELOPMENT (OFFICE OF HIGHWAYS). No. 96-C-1244. Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 21, 1996.

Prior report: La.App., — So.2d -; —So.2d-.

In re Transportation & Dev., Dept, of;— Defendant(s); applying for writ of certiorari and/or review; Parish of St. Charles, 29th Judicial District Court, Div. “D”, Nos. 31,104, 31,332; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, Nos. 95-CA-0715, 95-CA-0714.

Denied.

WATSON, J., would grant the writ. LEMMON, J., not on panel; recused.
